data: In a kitchen of moderate size, flagged with slate, humble in its appointments, yet looking scarcely that of a farmhouse—for there were utensils about it indicating necessities more artificial than usually grow upon a farm—with the corner of a white deal table between them, sat two young people evidently different in rank, and meeting upon no level of friendship.
browsing: literature|browsing: religion/spirituality/paranormal|browsing: fiction|category: novels|category: british literature
